section.20: The Book of Qiyam Al-Lail (The Night Prayer) and Voluntary Prayers During the Day

hadiths.text: It was narrated that Abdullah bin Abi Qais said:"I asked Aishah: "How did the Messenger of Allah (ï·º) recite at night- did he recite loudly or silently?" She said: 'He used to do both; sometimes he recited loudly and sometimes he recited silently
